I am trying to implement a freely propagating flame in AxiStagnFlow.  
I have made the modifications to the U-velocity equation and the 
boundary conditions.  I am wondering what the diag[] array is for.  
It seems that it is zero for algebraic constraints and 1 for non-
algebraic?  Numerically, what does it do.  

I'm trying to figure out whether the following should have diag[index
(c_offset_U,j)] set to 1 or 0.

else if(j==jfixed){
   rsd[index(c_offset_U,j)] = T(x,j)-Tfixed;


Thanks,

Karl
